tool_description: The cheapest and efficient translate API, supports detecting languages, pricing by requests, maximum 500 characters per request
name: Affordable Translate
title: Affordable Translate

api_list.name: Translate
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://affordable-translate.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "affordable-translate.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://affordable-translate.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "affordable-translate.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
